metadata.Title: CVE-2015-3750 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: WebKit in Apple Safari before 6.2.8, 7.x before 7.1.8, and 8.x before8.0.8, as used in iOS before 8.4.1 and other products, does not enforce theHTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS) protection mechanism for ContentSecurity Policy (CSP) report requests, which allows man-in-the-middleattackers to obtain sensitive information by sniffing the network or spoofa report by modifying the client-server data stream.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
